summary: This is a letter from the Warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York to Judge Richard M. Berman, responding to an inquiry about investigations into the July 23, 2019 incident involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The warden confirms that the FBI and OIG investigations will include this incident, but details of a prior internal investigation cannot be divulged.

keyFacts: An incident involving Jeffrey Epstein occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) on or about July 23, 2019.
An internal investigation regarding the July 23, 2019 incident had been completed prior to August 12, 2019.
The FBI and the Office of the Inspector General (OIG) were conducting ongoing investigations that would include the July 23 incident.
Due to the ongoing FBI and OIG investigations, the Warden could not divulge any information about the prior internal investigation at that time.
The correspondence shows judicial oversight, with Judge Berman actively inquiring about the investigations into Epstein's welfare and incidents in custody.
